title: Emperor of Hemp Marijuana
description:
Director Jeff Jones&#039;s lens offers a revealing look at the "Prophet of Pot," Jack Herer, a cult folk hero who&#039;s dedicated his life to battling marijuana and hemp prohibition. A tireless environmentalist and champion for the legalization of cannabis, Herer traces the history of a plant prized for its myriad benefits -- and exposes the political and business interests that have pushed "reefer madness" propaganda to criminalize hemp use.

IMDB: 5.7/10 <a href=" http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0264574/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0264574/</a>
